data.Name: guardin
data.Bio: Nicholas Kerr known on stage as Guardin born December 9th, 1996 in Hornell, New York is an American Signer-Songwriter, rapper, and producer who combines many genres and influences into his own unique style. He first started uploading his instrumental music to Soundcloud in 2014 before releasing "101" on May 7, 2016, which contains Nick's vocals. Since then he has released various singles, music videos, eps and mixtapes. Read more on Last.fm
